name: CUT 4 WAYS
description:
Peyote Tapes releases a double cassette 4 way split of some of NEW MEXICO`s most obscure sounds. Each artist gets a side to vamp.

A}ODNILA>G (psychoacoustic illusions from mateo galindo)
B}STREIGHTS(harsh self help meditations from D.Brigman)
C{LUPERCI(drone sitar manipulations from Joesph Angelo)
D{HEDIA (Fragile soundscapes from gold house's Bryce Hample)

Each side takes you into an sonic alley of Albuquerque, The tape scroll is not a map, to find the center you must travel in a circle.

name: Baby Shampoo//Indian Weapons split c30
description:
Baby Shampoo/Indian Weapons Split C30
Baby Shampoo are Albuquerque, New Mexico’s crustiest (and only) all girl noise unit. Here Peyote Tapes present a live recording of the ladies delivering a caustic and droning set at Titwrench, Denver CO’s all girl noise festival. Layers and layers of static, square waves and bass buzz converge into one blasting miasma of ur-woman sound. Indian Weapons are Oklahoma’s Brad Rose and Nathan Young churning wave after wave of blossoming organic vibration. Much like the duo’s previous work in Ajilvsga in that it’s heavy and intense, but rather than noise synth blast that is Ajilvsga’s modus operandi, Indian Weapons are more electro-acoustic and definitely more neon than dark. Edition of 50.

name: SABERTOOTH CAVITY-EnLakEch LP
description:
NEW!!!!
Sabertooth Cavity – En Lak Ech 12″LP (Sssk#52 co-released with Yesca label)
I’ve always been intrigued by this band: five guys who migrated from the Carlsbad Caverns to Albuquerque but never played together before. Overdriven cousin-guitars, a dented-sax, and a rhythm section so tight that it stretches.
The result is Jam, is in, jammed all up into one big spazzout.
Phenomenal live, still are the loudest boy-band in this desert.
Comes in a burlap sack so you can bury it.
Limited edition of 300. Includes digital download code.

name: FREE POP ARKESTRA-"IN COOL TIME" 7''
description: free(K)pop from the desert, 7" of mix colored wax. Released on full(y)blown, fully ANALOG. Phased falsetto's rub against junky guitars, no fi songs from A past captured NOW. A  schizo-trio that makes up an Arkestra. very "unique". These cat's got no place to be.
